mapper.select: SELECT p.id as p_id,p.postTitile,p.details,p.postTypeId,p.picturePath,p.videoPath,p.heat,(select count(1) from fs_praise where p.id=fs_praise.postId) as pcount,l.score,u.id as u_id,u.userName,u.avatarPath FROM fs_post as p,fs_postlist as l,fs_user as u WHERE p.id=l.postId and p.posterId=u.id and p.isAudit=1 ORDER BY l.score DESC limit #{page},#{limit}
SELECT count(1) FROM fs_post as p,fs_postlist as l,fs_user as u WHERE p.id=l.postId and p.posterId=u.id
